Package silverlib.geo

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.geo.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object

    Basic Point Class

    A class that represents a point in a 2D coordinate plane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Point​(int a, int b)
      Initializes a Point object from two integer x and y values.
      Point​(java.lang.String s)
      Initializes a Point from a String in the format (x,y)

                                    int yP,
                                    Point o,
                                    GraphType sourceType)
        Adjusts point from (0,0) to new origin
        Parameters:
        xP - The x component of the input point
        yP - The x component of the input point
        o - The new origin
        sourceType - Whether the y axis increases down or up
        Returns:
        The adjusted Point
        Since:
        1.9.1

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Point p)
        Tests for equality with another Point
        Parameters:
        p - The point to compare against
        Returns:
        true if the x and y values of both Points are equal, false otherwise
